title: Focus card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a gnarled claw adjusting a slanted set of scales.}} The Focus card moves one point from the player's worst stat to the best stat (these are selected randomly if all stats are equal). This can set a stat to [[stat zero|zero]].
